titles.title: A bill to apply the Federal medical assistance percentage determined for a State for fiscal year 2005 for fiscal years 2006 through 2014.
A bill to apply the Federal medical assistance percentage determined for a State for fiscal year 2005 for fiscal years 2006 through 2014.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Federal aid to child health services

bill.summary: Applies the FY2005 federal medical assistance percentage (FMAP) for a state to each of FY2006-FY2014 for the state for purposes of title XIX (Medicaid) and XXI (State Children's Health Insurance Program).
